description: Newer memory supersedes older on the same topic — temporal supersession

data.decision: Use SQLite for the storage layer

alternatives.reason_rejected: Too heavy for a local tool

memories.summary: Decision: Use SQLite for storage — simple and embedded

data.decision: Use SQLite with WAL mode and sqlite-vec extension for the storage layer
data.rationale: WAL enables concurrent reads, sqlite-vec adds vector search without external DB

memories.summary: Decision: SQLite + WAL + sqlite-vec for storage with vector search

expected_output.reason: mem-c21 is newer and refines the same decision with additional specifics (WAL, sqlite-vec)
